sentences.en: If he was the cynosure of all eyes he didn't notice.
sentences.cn: 如果他是大家关注的焦点的话,那他本人却注意不到这一点.

sentences.en: In the last 12 months, Stewart has become a tabloid regular and a blog - stalked cynosure.
sentences.cn: 在过去12个月中, 斯图尔特已成为小报和博客跟踪的北极星.

sentences.en: Let faith be your cynosure to walk by.
sentences.cn: 让信仰成为你生活中的灯塔.

sentences.en: Ruth was the cynosure of all eyes.
sentences.cn: 鲁思吸引了所有的目光。

sentences.en: She was the cynosure of all eyes , ie Everyone looked at her.
The princess, dressed head to foot in gold, was the cynosure of all eyes.
sentences.cn: 公主全身上下披金戴银，是众目注视的焦点。

trans.tran_cn: 引人注目的人（或物），焦点
